job.title: Junior Site Reliability Engineer-Citi Technology Infrastructure
job.description:
Job Id: 21267690

We are looking for a motivated Junior Site Reliability Engineer who prefers to live on the cutting edge of cloud infrastructure management, Application Performance Management (APM), and Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC).

An ideal candidate would have both software engineering experience as well as DevOps/Sysadmin experience however we are open to anyone passionate about creating organized, efficient, and scalable cloud infrastructure which is easy to deploy and maintain.

Responsibilities:
  • Provision new infrastructure and monitor existing one
  • Set up automated mechanisms that spot issues early
  • Configure alarms and alerts to find any performance issues
  • Assist the team with technology selection
  • Front-line for Production monitoring + response in case of issues
  • Works on the design of new features / functionality to ensure Security + Resiliency + Monitoring are baked into every release.
  • Works with the team on releases
Qualifications:
  • 1 year of experience as SRE, software engineer, or systems administrator
  • Comfortable working with Docker / Containers
  • Experience with coding in any language
  • Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery and APM implementation experience
  • Consistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communication
  • Demonstrated problem-solving and decision-making skills
  • Ability to work under pressure and manage deadlines or unexpected changes in expectations or requirements
Education:
  • Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experience
This job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed. Other job-related duties may be assigned as required.
